description: Kingston’s DataTraveler Locker+ USB Flash drive is ideal for people and organizations that require the most secure way to store and transfer portable data. It uses hardware encryption to safeguard 100 percent of stored data in case the drive is lost or stolen. No need to worry about sensitive and personal documents ending up in the wrong hands. Customize DataTraveler Locker+ by adding your logo and/or digital files to instantly increase your brand recognition. DataTraveler Locker+ is backed by a five-year warranty, free tech support and legendary Kingston reliability.
title: Kingston Data Traveler Locker+ with Encryption 16 GB USB 2.0 Hi-Speed DataTraveler  DTL+/16 GB
